description:
Knowing what equity options are available, and understanding the differences between Precious Metal Equities, can be challenging for the novice. 

What is an ETF?  How does it differ from a Royalty Company?  What options are there for investing in silver and gold equities?

This course is meant to introduce the uninitiated to the many possibilities when researching precious metal stocks.  It provides ample equity names, trading symbols, and relevant information to assist the buyer.

It is meant to save those new to the sector hours of research by covering the most relevant metal equity investments.  It also presents and explains the major precious metal Indexes in use today.

The course consists of a series of college lecture slides.

It should take one hour to complete.

Instructor consultation will be via e-mail.
title: Precious Metal Equities
